text.0: one is a youth brown active manifold he decks the golden one with ornament.
text.1: another luminous occupies the place of sacritice sage among the gods.
text.2: one brandishes in his hand an iron knife firm in his seat amid the deities.
text.3: another holds the thunderbolt wherewith he slays the vṛtras resting in his hand.
text.4: another bears a pointed weapon bright is he and strong with healing medicines.
text.5: another thieflike watches well the ways and knows the places where the treasures lie.
text.6: another with his mighty stride hath made his three steps thither where the gods rejoice.
text.7: two with one dame ride on with winged steeds and journey forth like travellers on their way.
text.8: two highest in the heavens have set their seat worshipped with holy oil imperial kings.
text.9: some singing lauds conceived the sāmahymn great hymn whereby they caused the sun to shine.
